title: Carrier Command: Gaea Mission
notes: This notoriously shonky game runs just as well as it did on Windows.

title: Carrier Command: Gaea Mission
notes: Demoting this one to Stable: While it renders very smoothly and draws most graphical features perfectly, there is a problem with Gamma control not working. The Map screen shows only black lines where it should be light-grey/blue, making playing the game from the map screen very difficult. Also, the sound is...odd. Sometimes the correct sound effect doesn't play at the right time (e.g. engine noise), and even music can cut out.

title: Carrier Command: Gaea Mission
notes: The game crashes while alt-tabbing. The performance is somewhat poor but it's playable (you should be able to achieve 60 fps with medium settings)
Traversing the Old Factory on campaign start is not possible. Seems some mechanics do not trigger correctly and you find yourself locked in, reloading then crashes the game.
title: Carrier Command: Gaea Mission

notes: Runs well so far, no problems with graphics or audio, although I found the mouse to be hyper-sensitive. I haven't spent much time playing it so far.
title: Carrier Command: Gaea Mission
